name: Art Of Air War (itch)
description:
Art Of Air War is an air war game, fighter jet flying mission , You've been giving the objective of taking out enemy jets and ships


FEATURES:
- Unlock fighter jets by completing levels and getting coins
- 2 controlling mode joystick control and gravity sensor control
- Wide variety of mission content 
- Dynamic sound effects to recreate realistic experience
- High quality world environments 
- Realistic jets crashes, explosions and smoke effects.
